message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $100.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $100 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now.  Would you be willing to go down to $90?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can do $95, but that's as low as I can go.
